record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - November 20, 2008)

[Page: S10698]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the period for morning business be extended to 3 p.m., with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
